events.title: Albert Spaggiari tunnels into a bank vault

movie.title: Les égouts du paradis
movie.plot: Albert Spaggiari (Francis Huster) plays Spaggiari, who organises a group of gangsters to break into the vault of the Societé Générale Bank in Nice by tunnelling up through the sewers below....
